contentListingItemsSimple.title: New Music Discovery: Mumford and Sons "Believe"
contentListingItemsSimple.desc: Are you ready for a brand new sound from Mumford and Sons? The dudes have ditched their banjos and kick drums for a bigger, more electric sound on their new record.
